description: Performs object detection on the specified image.Two input methods are supported -- (1) Uploading an image or (2) specifying an image URL.A successful response will be returned in JSON. If the request failed, the response will contain an error code and a message to help understand what went wrong.

requestid.description: Id of the REST API request.

image_url.description: A JSON document with a URL pointing to the image that is to be analyzed.
